description: Meet the NEWPoetic(TM) Slimbook High Quality PU Leather Case forAcer Iconia Tab A100.We spend quite a lot time to think how people use their Acer Iconia Tab A100, and what kind of case would best fit Acer Iconia Tab A100 users. As a result, we think a case which offersmaximum protectionin modern design,superior protective material qualityand anultra light designtruly expresses each individual's unique character.This case is made of High Quality Leather. It issuper thinandlight weight, making this ultra slim case easy to carry in a bag. It is designed for Acer Iconia Tab A100 specifically with Stand feature. The Slimbook case provides total all around protection for your Acer Iconia Tab A100 device.It is the bestAcer Iconia Tab A100 Case out there on the Market!!!Give the Poetic brand a try to protect your device with a fashionable look!! Being affordable and reliable, this might be exactly what you are looking for!Our product is backed with a 2 year warranty from Poetic so you can be rest assured that we will take care of you.Poetic is the registered trademark of EXACT DESIGN Inc and it is protected by US Trademark Law. Exact-Deal is the only Authorized seller of this brand and product on Amazon.
title: Poetic(TM) Slimbook Leather Case for Acer Iconia Tab A100 7-Inch Android Tablet Wi-Fi (Black)
